channel.title: How to make Teleport working on right click [pi]
channel.description:
how do i make Aubury teleports me when i click on right click then teleport plz help :D
http://prntscr.com/zxusw << how it looks

item.title: How to make Teleport working on right click [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

1 2 3 4 KOED:

It’s possible. Just not sure how to. Perhaps search around the web i’m sure there are a few guides on it!

Well, I understand that.
What I should have said was “I don’t think it’s possible at your skill level”
It requires packet modification so the game understands fourth click NPC.
-Pi doesn’t come standard with that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Teleport working on right click [pi]

item.title: How to make Teleport working on right click [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, you’re going to have to mess with fourth click npc (is that even real?)
You should remove the “Buy Skillcape” option. So you could just do third click npc.

Read full topic
